document_data.name: Marcius Stonehall
document_data.mainbody:
'''General Marcius Stonehall''' was the leader of the forces at [[Fort Arran]]. There are some rumours that he went adventuring with [[Gavilon]] and [[Thuragar]] during his younger days, but he refrained from discussing them in public.

{{stub-person}}
